English: \n\nThat’ll teach me to wish for some excitement.

One minute, I’m “patrolling” the beach, the next me and
my buddies are racing around the island, dodging bullets, everything FUBARed to hell.

The Sahrani Liberation Army hit us hard and fast, and
the Royals got caught with their shorts down.

We managed to haul ass out of the base in Corazol
with most of our company intact.

Under Captain Armstrong’s orders, we regrouped
in the town of Ortego, about three klicks due south.

While the captain had us digging in, I spotted him
barking orders to a special forces unit.

Here’s hoping they show those SLA guys
who they’re fucking with.
